A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: On the surface it's entertaining\, but lacks a strong formal design in story telling and development of themes and motives. They focused too much on the graphics and CGI\, and marketing\, in which\, they succeeded. In a business perspective\, it is a huge success. I didn't even mind the unexpected plot twists (for example: rey's parents among others)\, and would have supported them as long as it was developed well.
